page.title: 03St.Joseph's/Monks Kirby.
page.content: St.Joseph's first school is situated about 200m. along the road from the middle school.It is a{Roman Catholic} first school and has about 50 pupils. Most of the children transfer to Brockhurst Middle School at the age of 8 years along with the other children from the first schools at{Harborough {Magna}and{Brinklow. St.Joseph's school has two full time teachers and two part time helpers, one of which also helps out at the middle school.Of the three first schools St.Joseph's,due to its proximity,has probably formed the closest links with the middle school, taking part in joint services at Christmas and other times of the year as well as sports and fund raising functions.
